generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of "Name of Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Designation of Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Email ID of Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Office Telephone Number of Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Residence Telephone Number of Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Place of Signing by Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Date of Signing by Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Name of Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Designation of Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Email ID of Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Office Telephone Number of Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Residence Telephone Number of Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Residence Telephone Number of Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Date of Signing by Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Fax Number of Authorised Reporting Official" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Fax Number of Person Countersigned" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Total Number of Branches Including Extension Counters" is mandatory.
Reporting of "High Risk Vulnerability Branches" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Normal Risk Vulnerability Branches" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Total Number of Vulnerable Branches" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Armed Guards" is mandatory.
Reporting of "UnArmed Guards" is mandatory.
"Number of Branches in Which Alarm System Has Been Provided" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Collapsible Doors and Shutters At The Main Entrance" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Night Latches Auto Lock to Cashiers Cabins" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Grill Gatest to Strong Rooms" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Cash Vans for Remittance of Cash" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Armoured Cash Vans" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Closed Circuit TVs" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Time Lock Devices" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Police Armed Guards Provided" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Currency Chests Provided with Hot Line Telephone" is mandatory.
